ambiguity.explanation: Race started by three boats then abandoned due to lightning; no finish order established. All starters DNF with irrecoverable positions.

evidence.text: Scooter, Itch, and Ambush went out and started the race. Only to turn back once the lightning came.
evidence.author: Jackson
